languages.text: {n}Рабочие прячут взгляды, обращенные к нам. Но я слышу, как ропот эхом расходится по отсеку. В их глазах бессильная ярость, направленная на Плеть. Ибо она — воплощение ненавистного им порядка. Но почему они не осознают, что блюститель — не только бич, но и щит?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Рабочие стараются скрыть взгляды, обращенные к нам. Но я вижу... Слышу, как ропот эхом расходится по отсеку. В их глазах бессильная ярость, направленная на Плеть. Ибо она воплощение ненавистного им порядка вещей. Но почему они видят лишь угнетение? Не осознают, что блюститель не только бич, но и щит?{/n}

languages.text: {n}The workers hide their eyes. But I can hear the murmurs echoing through the bay. There is an impotent rage in their hearts directed at Whip, for she is the embodiment of the very order they despise. But why do they not realise that the enforcer is a shield as much as a lash?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Рабочие прячут взгляды, обращенные к нам. Но я слышу, как ропот эхом расходится по отсеку. В их глазах бессильная ярость, направленная на Плеть. Ибо она — воплощение ненавистного им порядка. Но почему они не осознают, что блюститель — не только бич, но и щит?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The workers hide their eyes as they look at us. But I can hear the murmurs echoing through the compartment. There is a powerless rage in their hearts directed at Scourge, for she is the embodiment of the order they hate. But why do they not realise that the enforcer is a shield as much as a lash?{/n}

{n}The workers hide their eyes as they look at us. But I can hear the murmurs echoing through the compartment. There is a powerless rage in their hearts directed at Scourge, for she is the embodiment of the order they hate. But why do they not realise that the enforcer is a shield as much as a lash?{/n}

{n}The workers hide their eyes as they look at us. But I can hear the murmurs echoing through the compartment. But why do they not realise that the enforcer is a shield as much as a lash?{/n}

{n}The workers hide their eyes. But I can hear the murmurs echoing through the bay. There is an impotent rage in their hearts directed at Whip, for she is the embodiment of the very order they despise. But why do they not realise that the enforcer is a shield as much as a lash?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Arbeiter verbergen ihre Augen. Doch ich höre das Gemurmel durch das Modul hallen. Sie tragen eine ohnmächtige Wut im Herzen, eine Wut, die gegen Peitsche gerichtet ist, denn sie ist die Verkörperung des Befehls, den sie derart verachten. Warum aber erkennen sie nicht, dass die Enforcerin ebenso sehr Schild wie Waffe ist?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The workers hide their eyes. But I can hear the murmurs echoing through the bay. There is an impotent rage in their hearts directed at Whip, for she is the embodiment of the very order they despise. But why do they not realise that the enforcer is a shield as much as a lash?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Arbeiter verbergen ihre Augen. Doch ich höre das Gemurmel durch das Modul hallen. Sie tragen eine ohnmächtige Wut im Herzen, eine Wut, die gegen Peitsche gerichtet ist, denn sie ist die Verkörperung des Befehls, den sie derart verachten. Warum aber erkennen sie nicht, dass die Enforcerin ebenso sehr Schild wie Waffe ist?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los trabajadores agachan la mirada, pero puedo oír los murmullos que recorren la bahía. Hay una rabia impotente en sus corazones dirigida a Látigo, pues es la encarnación del mismo orden que tanto detestan. Pero ¿por qué no entienden que la guardia es tanto un escudo como un látigo?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The workers hide their eyes. But I can hear the murmurs echoing through the bay. There is an impotent rage in their hearts directed at Whip, for she is the embodiment of the very order they despise. But why do they not realise that the enforcer is a shield as much as a lash?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los trabajadores agachan la mirada, pero puedo oír los murmullos que recorren la bahía. Hay una rabia impotente en sus corazones dirigida a Látigo, pues es la encarnación del mismo orden que tanto detestan. Pero ¿por qué no entienden que la guardia es tanto un escudo como un látigo?{/n}

languages.text: {n}労働者たちは自分たちの目を隠している。しかし、ベイ内に響くざわめきが聞こえてくる。彼らの心の中では、ウィップに向けられた無力な怒りがある。なぜなら彼女は彼らが軽蔑している秩序そのものを体現しているからだ。だが、どうして彼らはエンフォーサーも鞭であると同時に立てであることに気づかないのだろうか？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The workers hide their eyes. But I can hear the murmurs echoing through the bay. There is an impotent rage in their hearts directed at Whip, for she is the embodiment of the very order they despise. But why do they not realise that the enforcer is a shield as much as a lash?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}労働者たちは自分たちの目を隠している。しかし、ベイ内に響くざわめきが聞こえてくる。彼らの心の中では、ウィップに向けられた無力な怒りがある。なぜなら彼女は彼らが軽蔑している秩序そのものを体現しているからだ。だが、どうして彼らはエンフォーサーも鞭であると同時に立てであることに気づかないのだろうか？{/n}

languages.text: {n}那些工人不敢望向这里，但我听到船舱里流淌着潺潺的低语声。他们心中充满了无力的愤怒，直指“皮鞭”本人，因为她正是他们所鄙夷的秩序化身。然而，他们为什么没有意识到——执法者不仅仅是盾牌，也同样是鞭子？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The workers hide their eyes. But I can hear the murmurs echoing through the bay. There is an impotent rage in their hearts directed at Whip, for she is the embodiment of the very order they despise. But why do they not realise that the enforcer is a shield as much as a lash?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那些工人不敢望向这里，但我听到船舱里流淌着潺潺的低语声。他们心中充满了无力的愤怒，直指“皮鞭”本人，因为她正是他们所鄙夷的秩序化身。然而，他们为什么没有意识到——执法者不仅仅是盾牌，也同样是鞭子？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les ouvriers ont beau dissimuler leurs regards, j'entends malgré tous les murmures qui résonnent dans la baie. Toute la rage qui bouillonne dans leur cœur est dirigée contre Fouet, incarnation même de l'ordre qu'ils méprisent. Ignorent-ils que les prévôts font aussi bien office de fouet que de bouclier ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The workers hide their eyes. But I can hear the murmurs echoing through the bay. There is an impotent rage in their hearts directed at Whip, for she is the embodiment of the very order they despise. But why do they not realise that the enforcer is a shield as much as a lash?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les ouvriers ont beau dissimuler leurs regards, j'entends malgré tous les murmures qui résonnent dans la baie. Toute la rage qui bouillonne dans leur cœur est dirigée contre Fouet, incarnation même de l'ordre qu'ils méprisent. Ignorent-ils que les prévôts font aussi bien office de fouet que de bouclier ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}İşçiler gözlerini kaçırsa da bölmenin başından sonuna dek yankılanan mırıltıları duyabiliyorum. Yüreklerinde Kamçı'ya yönelmiş zayıf bir öfke yatıyor çünkü o, hor gördükleri düzenin ete kemiğe bürünmüş hâli. Peki infazcının kırbacın yanı sıra bir kalkan da olduğunu neden göremiyorlar?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The workers hide their eyes. But I can hear the murmurs echoing through the bay. There is an impotent rage in their hearts directed at Whip, for she is the embodiment of the very order they despise. But why do they not realise that the enforcer is a shield as much as a lash?{/n}
